title: What was the phy isa bruh 😭
content: I think even if I didn't study, I'd get the same 💀

comments.body: tru

NAH FR THO WTF WAS THAT PAPER 😭😭😭😭

canon event

and web tech

brooo actually mann....the fuckk was that paper...i studied soo much daaa.....(made my OWN FUCKING NOTES....for this??!?!?!?)

paper setter ki mkc....aadha paper slides se aaya bhi nhi bc
I mean after so many people got 9+ cgpa in first sem for free just like that.. So well deserved 👏👏 now they will struggle to pass 😂😂😂. They became overconfident.
Abey only 21 percent have crossed 8.75 in rr campus how it this "so many people" lmao?
I feel you. Even I found it difficult. Just practice
istg
i have a lot of friends who got 9+ in p cycle last time (i on the other hand), but still the statistics show smthng else lol
Are you depressed about it?
Nah, I got other shit to do

That hard? Damm but I studied it for 1 day I am pretty sure I'll get 25-30. Ik it's less but people really need to read with a plan instead of trying to cover the whole slide which is definitely not ideal for the mind 😭
